website_summaries.verdict: Pulling from 25 years of Magic the Gathering, this set is an all-star assembly of beloved and iconic cards of all types that dates back to the origins of the long-standing card game.
pros: Includes 24 booster packs, with 360 total cards
There are 249 cards to collect in this series, and they are all reprints of classic cards
cons: With only 360 cards in the box, chances are extremely slim that you are going to add all Masters 25 cards to your collection with only 1 booster box

customer_reviews.title: False "factory sealed" claim
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was factory sealed. It arrived in the pictured wrapping (clearly not the WotC wrapping) which I didn't pay attention to until I opened it and saw every single pack open. If I wanted to buy overpriced singles, I would have got to my local game store. Unacceptable to claim factory sealed and charge full price. Flash advertising and a clear attempt to rip off customers. I have requested a replacement and will update once I recieve it. UPDATE: 7/8/2020: Received the replacement and once again, all packs have been opened and rares removed. I am returning it and will not be buying from this seller ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Sangadzhieva

customer_reviews.title: Stellar draft set now that the price has dropped
customer_reviews.text: This is worth $160 for a fun drafting night. You'll go home with a few modern/Legacy playable cards and the balance is great. Waste of money when it was full price but it's in the right range for a powerful Limited night. I've bought two boxes now for different nights and each time everyone was impressed and happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Save the packs for drafting
customer_reviews.text: A rather underwhelming set. I got the best rare cards, but they weren’t worth very much. It’s a great draft set, though, as it’s quite balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Hachiman

customer_reviews.title: Morph madness
customer_reviews.text: Some really nice value in here. Not just mythics either. Would recommend. Awesome for morph fans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Described All Factory Sealed "Pulled A Jace"
customer_reviews.text: Good box pulled 3 mythics, blood moon, an some other higher dollar cards I would say I broke even.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: MTG Masters 25 Box
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping. Love busting packs to see what treasures await.
customer_reviews.author: lh

customer_reviews.title: Pack looked possibly resealed but scratches all lined up in the same spot so I'm guessing it was a bad machine.
customer_reviews.text: Wow so fast. Bought the booster box at 10pm Saturday night and woke up to it around 11am. These wizards man, epic pulls ($78 so far) and I'm only 4 packs deep. Will buy from this dealer again. Pack looked possibly resealed but scratches all lined up in the same spot so I'm guessing it was a bad machine. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the returns
customer_reviews.text: Wait. Stop. Buy the cards you want as singles. This box does not have a return value. It came wonderful shipped though. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Knelsen

customer_reviews.title: All chase cards pulled on first box
customer_reviews.text: Got great pulls out of this box that came out to more than what I paid for the box. Your experience may not be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Careful where you get booster boxes from.
customer_reviews.text: Even the most prestigious of sellers like Channel_Fireball uses ordinary people as sellers and you can get screwed over in a heartbeat. This box is worthless and cost me $250+
customer_reviews.author: Trent Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. The cards reprinted are actually stuff you woild play not just junk. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy. My husband was like a kid in ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. My husband was like a kid in a candy store. And yes, he pulled a Jace too.
customer_reviews.author: pissedfemale

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: YMMV, not worth it if price continues to climb. That said, had a great box opening and am extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Foil Jace
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and quickly! Pulled a foil Jace out of the first box I opened. Probably won’t even open the other 2 I bought. Package was good and right, all packs were sealed properly. As I said, came factory sealed and described!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Krager

customer_reviews.title: foil swords and more great
customer_reviews.text: I pulled a foil azuza , jace , veindilion clique, phyrexian obliterator and all the 3 of the 5 lands, foil swords and more great box
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K.

customer_reviews.title: Got overall pretty lucky with this box
customer_reviews.text: New in box sealed product received as advertised. I got Jace!!! Got overall pretty lucky with this box. Iconic Masters...not so much. :/
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Got lucky!
customer_reviews.text: Pulled my first Jace, an Ensnaring Bridge, Azusa and a Bloodmoon! Super happy about my first booster box purchase in awhile. Thanks a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Nate LeClair

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get anything good. Max $7 pull. Bad box for me.
customer_reviews.author: NS263

customer_reviews.title: Re-sealed masters 25 box sold as factory sealed at full price.
customer_reviews.text: Went to open my "factory sealed" masters 25 box and every single one has been cut and repacked. I paid 250.00 for this product. Horrible horrible reviews. Be careful out there.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware If You Have Lvl 0 Luck
customer_reviews.text: Pulled a Jace and a bunch of other bombs so I’m happy ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: Consider buying...
customer_reviews.text: Got the wrong box. Instead got a box of Iconic Masters. Although... Got a foil Mana drain. So I'll let it slide. 2 stars instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the two beat cards in the set. Many other good pulls.
customer_reviews.author: john ballway

customer_reviews.title: Was a great purchase. Happy with the speed it came in ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a great purchase. Happy with the speed it came in and the fact it wasn't damaged from the transit
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Hosmer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband birthday gift! And let me just say its was well worth my money. The box was not tampered with. I'm more that happy that we ended up getting a $70 card Jace, the Mind Sculptor. I'm husband is thrill on his present.
customer_reviews.author: Dajah K Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Card 100% resealed
customer_reviews.text: Every pack I opened felt a little suspicious how sticky the bottem was and I was pulling nothing but repeat commons and trash rares. So I investigated a bit to see if I could find and glue residue. Turns out every pack I opened was resealed and replaced with bad cards. Do not buy this set from these people obviously just scaming people to make a few dollars... just sad
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: excellent box. But the reason I’m giving this 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Pulled a foil chalice of the void and a non foil chalice.... excellent box. But the reason I’m giving this 5 stars is because it’s exactly what is listed, a sealed box of masters 25. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: thebearded_1

customer_reviews.title: Very lucky box
customer_reviews.text: Pulled a Jace, Recruiter, and a foil Summoners Pact. Great foil commons and uncommons. Absolutely amazing box, exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Spicyweiner

customer_reviews.title: Great with lots of classic Modern staples
customer_reviews.text: Great if you want to host a draft or if you just want to open packs in hope of getting chase cards that you want/need. Out of the two boxes I opened, I managed to pull enough cards to cover the cost of the 3 boxes I purchased but don't take my experience as a guarantee that you'll get good pulls. I have one more box but it's put away as a gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: TheRedheadWithThread

customer_reviews.title: Bad Mythic Miss!
customer_reviews.text: Paid a decent price for box. The contents were horrible. It's almost as if someone tried to put the three worse mythics in the box. Tree, Doomsday and Akroma Red. This is not sellers fault. It's horrible collation by Wizards. They missed the mark on the set celebrating 25 years of magic.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Vizzone

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if I just got a bad box or what
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I just got a bad box or what. But I only pulled to 2 garbage mythics..(Armageddon and prossh) I paid out the ass for this product. It's only 25 or something packs, priced at around $11-12 a pack. The chances of actually getting a jace, if thats what your looking for, is low..prob better to just buy jace individually. I was really excited for this set before it came out. I was never so disappointed with a booster box as I was with this one. The tolarian tutor also pulled crap out of boxes multiple times. It would have been smarter to just pick up an iconic masters box...
customer_reviews.author: Janett Carreon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun great cards
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 booster boxes and so far I've made my money back and then some 2 Jace and 2 ensnaring bridge lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Tom dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Not out until March 16, 2018.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine set, it is not out yet so don't listen to the other reviewers just yet, ESPECIALLY if they recommend getting Iconic Masters which IS a low value set. Do some research, this set isn't bad for a Masters set and it drops March 16, 2018 so anyone posting low reviews are just upset for personal reasons. Happy hunting to all who buy! Best of luck!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: TWO BLUE COUNTER SPELL IS BACK!!
customer_reviews.text: These other reviews are whack as hell.... Two mana CounterSpell as COMMON!!, Lighting Bolt , Jace the mother f.... Sculptor. And all of the new artwork on some of the cards is absolutely stunning!!! I can not wait to buy a box and draft this set in LGS!! If you really think the value is going to drop your insane... Just like all those people saying Unstable would flop....
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

product_meta.title: Magic the Gathering "Masters 25" Factory Sealed Booster Box MTG Card Game - 24 packs
product_meta.description: This is a Pre Order Item comes out March 16th
feature_bullets: Players will get to draft like a master as they are taken back through time to experience some of the most popular planes, mechanics, and spells in Magic's history!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars85 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
